blogs.title: Blog Title 1
blogs.description: LEV, a mysterious man with a dark past, becomes the guardian of an orphaned girl, LEELA. When he saves MIRA, a lady detective, from dangerous criminals, she uncovers his deadly secret while investigating a murder—and unexpectedly becomes the mother LEELA needs.

blogs.title: Blog Title 2
blogs.description: A mysterious boy who lives in a lake saves a little girl's life, causing him to lose his true identity. Twenty years later, as adults, the two are drawn back together by a crime event, and the boy saves the girl’s life again, unlocking his lost memories. and returning to the lake that is his true home. loremwho lives in a lake saves a little girl's life, causing him to lose his true identity.
